Sentencas: A systematic study of 10 transition metal ions (M = Sc, Ti, V, Cr, Mn, Fe, Co, Ni, Cu and Zn) doping in Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta cathode for solid oxide fuel cells is performed by measuring their crystal structures, electrical conductivities and electrochemical performances.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: The presence of metal ion dopants in the Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta matrix significantly influences its crystal structure and electrochemical performances.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: The electrochemical performances of metal ion-doped Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta cathodes are quantified in terms of the electrical conductivity, impedance and power density of button cells.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: Doping with small amounts of ions for cobalt has negligible effect on the structure of powder samples as all of them form single-phase solid solutions with monoclinic misfit layered structure.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: However, the bar type samples of doping with Ti, Cr, Mn, Fe, Co, Ni, Cu and Zn keep the structure intact while those of doping with Sc and V slightly decompose after sintering.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: It is proposed that the metal dopants are located at different sites of double layered Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta matrix due to their different ion radii, which mainly accounts for the difference of conductivity of doped samples.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: Among them, the Cu doped Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta sample (Ca2.9Bi0.1Co3.9Cu0.1O9-delta) shows the highest electrical conductivity in the whole temperature range and has the lowest area specific resistance at 750 and 800 degrees
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: C. The Ca2.9Bi0.1Co3.9Cu0.1O9-delta vertical bar Ce0.8Sm0.2O2+gamma vertical bar NiO + Ce0.8Sm0.2O2+gamma button cell shows obvious improvement than Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-delta vertical bar Ce0.8Sm0.2O2+gamma vertical bar NiO + Ce0.8Sm0.2O2+gamma button cell.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode

Sentencas: The maximal power densities of the Ca2.9Bi0.1Co3.9Cu0.1O9-delta cathode-cell were 689, 465 and 331 mW cm(-2) at 800, 750 and 700 degrees C respectively.
Titulo: Effects of transition metal ion dopants on the performance of Ca2.9Bi0.1Co4O9-δ cathode
